verbose_text: Nagy et al. studied the expression of galectin-8 in colon cancer and they found that depending on the change in the malignancy of the colon tissues, the immunohistochemical expression of galectin-8 was remarkably decreased, and as the malignancy of a tumor became higher, the amount of galectin-8 protein was reduced so that the expression of galectin-8 was lower in the cancer tissues than that the normal tissues or the benign tissues of the colon cancer.
